statements.statement: The prisoners only see shadows cast upon the cave wall, mistaking them for reality.

citations.text: Behold! human beings living in an underground den...

statements.statement: Leaving the cave is painful but reveals true forms under the sunlight.

citations.text: At first he will see the shadows best...

statements.statement: Education is the turning of the soul toward the Form of the Good.

citations.text: Education is not what some people boastfully assert it to be...

arguments.desc: Learning moves the soul from illusion to knowledge of the Good.

premise.statement: The prisoners only see shadows cast upon the cave wall, mistaking them for reality.

citations.text: Behold! human beings living in an underground den...

premise.statement: Leaving the cave is painful but reveals true forms under the sunlight.

citations.text: At first he will see the shadows best...

conclusion.statement: Education is the turning of the soul toward the Form of the Good.

citations.text: Education is not what some people boastfully assert it to be...
